author: Petrana Radulovic
title: The Road to El Dorado survived bad reviews, financial failure, and shitposting
description: The DreamWorks animated movie The Road to El Dorado, now streaming on Hulu, bombed in 2000, but found a strong internet fandom. Characters like Tulio and Miguel popped up in memes, GIFs, and headcanons across Tumblr and beyond. There’s a reason why.
content:
The Road to El Dorado was ahead of its time. 
DreamWorks Animations third movie, made during the era when the studio was still finding its voice and purpose, is a buddy adventure in the style of Bob Hope and Bing Crosbys Road tomovies. Two decades after its … [+9965 chars]
